member.summary: Overloaded version of Add. Adds a new cr object to the list of cr objects
member.param: The index paramter
The currency pair name. (On the form EUR/USD)
The quote currency
Size of a lot for the pair in the quote currency
The value of one PIP in the quote currency
The pair's normal spread
Number of decimals used for quoting the currency. Normally 4 or 2
The quote currency's prefix for example Â¥ for JPY
